lead_paragraph: On Monday evening, the Governor and his escort returned to this place from Tamaqua. Owing to the darkness of the night, and the fear of accident, they were forced to travel very slow, and it was 12 o'clock before they arrived at Mount Carbon. The Governor was met by a large party of miners, with their lamps burning, and escorted to his quarters, the Governor being on foot.
